subject: Re: younger minds, better equiment--cheaper!
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Younger Minds---Perhaps

Better Equipment---Not based on my test results from it

Cheaper---Not Really.

It's reasonably priced, but i am adding a simple sweep circuit to RS radios for a total of about $85 including all the parts and the radio itself.  And it sounds great if i can keep it working, lately they have been.

-Steve H.
